attributes.action: Cancell the plans for a super Mosque to be built in Stratford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Visitors to our Capital should view a skyline of our historical heritage and this view should not be blocked by a religious building belonging to a minority group. This is a Christian country and within our community we welcome other religions but to build a super Mosque when there are many Mosques in East London is neither necessary nor desirable

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
